description:
**Fix Overview**:

In response to the recent changes affecting domain-joined users regarding Windows 11 upgrades:

1. Review your group policies to control user upgrade prompts effectively.
2. Consider using Device Management tools to manage Windows upgrade settings for domain-joined machines.

**Details**:
- By adjusting the policies, you can prevent unwanted prompts for upgrades to Windows 11 through registry settings or Group Policy Objects (GPO).
- Stay proactive in monitoring communications from Microsoft for any further changes that might impact your deployment strategies. (LLM Synthesized)
